title: Announcement, "Review Committee Selections: Lynn Galbreath/ Connie Samaras", 1989
title_raw: Review Committee Selections: Lynn Galbreath/ Connie Samaras
signed: Signature imprinted in blue ink at lower left, verso: STAMPEDOUTDESIGN: EDWARD FELLA
inscribed:
Recto: Imprinted in blue across upper half of sheet: REVIEW/ COMMITTEE/ SELECTIONS:/ LYNN GALBREATH/ CONNIE SAMARAS; upper right quadrant, upwards, sideways: '89/ REVIEW COMMITEE:/ hAR OLD ALLEN/ MAR I A A NNE IETASI/ W ENDY MACGAW/ URSULA MOUSTARDAS/ LYNNE RESCH; across lower sheet: DETROIT FOCUS GALLERY/ HOURS: WEDNESDAY --SAT. NOON- 6PM/ 743 BEAUBIEN 3RD FLOOR/ DETROIT , MICHIGAN4 8226/ 313 962 -- 9025/ CLOSED DEC27 -- JAN10/ NOVEMBER17-- DECEMBER23, 1989/ CLOSED THANKSGIVING WEEKEND:/ NOV 23-25; across lower left quadrant: OPENING:/ FRIDAY/ NOVEMBER 17/ 5:30-- 8:30/ ALSO IN THE AREA:/ DETROIT ARTISTS MARKET:/ "WINDOW  SHOPPING"NOV 17,5--7:30

Verso: Across lower left quadrant: DETROIT FOCUS GALLERY/ 743 BEAUBIEN 3RD FLOOR/ DETROIT MICHIGAN 48226/ WITH SUPPORT FROM THE/ NATIONAL ENDOWMENT FOR THE ARTS/ MICHIGAN COUNCIL/ FOR THE ARTS/ DETROIT COUNCIL FOR THE ARTS; lower sheet, center, running upward, sideways: ACROSS FROM/ THE/ RICKTOWN STATION; across lower right quadrant: NON-- PROFIT ORG./ BULKRATE/ U.S.POSTAGE/ PAID/ DETROIT MICHIGAN/ PERMIT/ NUMBER 2960
description:
Poster announcement for exhibition at Detroit Focus Gallery, designed to be mailed.  Printed in dark blue ink.  
Recto: Two text blocks with typeface in a variety of sizes giving title, participating artists, location, dates, times, contact and additional information.  Upper right quadrant, running upward, sideways, text giving members of review committee, several characters crossed out.  
Verso: Upper left corner, two small hands pointing upward.  Upper sheet, left, 13 rows of small hands pointing downward.  Lower sheet, text in a variety of sizes, styles giving sponsors and mailing information.

tombstone.epitaph: Announcement, "Review Committee Selections: Lynn Galbreath/ Connie Samaras", 1989. Offset lithograph on off-white paper.. Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-30.
